question: Which of the following graphs represents the variation of magnetic field B with perpendicular distance 'r' from an infinitely long, straight conductor carrying current?
explanation: For an infinite straight wire, <katex>$B = \frac{\mu_0 I}{2\pi r}$</katex>.
This implies <katex>$B \propto 1/r$</katex>, which corresponds to a rectangular hyperbola graph.
